Package projetjeu.modele

Class PrincipalGrid

java.lang.Object
projetjeu.modele.PrincipalGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grid
public class PrincipalGrid extends Object implements Grid
The game grid, where everything in the game takes place.

    • getNeighbouringFreeTiles

      Filtering method listing only the free tiles around the parameter tile, used to find planting sites.
      Parameters:
      t - The center tile.
      size - Size of the area to cover.
      Returns:
      the list of all neighbouring free tiles.
